title: Walking in Grace with Grief: Meditations for Healing After Loss
description: Walking in Grace with Grief, combines Della’s story of loss with teachings of energy awareness, mindfulness, and conscious living. Filled with stories of hope and profound confidence in life after life, Walking in Grace with Grief includes many practical skills such as grounding to the earth and “filling in” with life-force energy. The easy to follow meditations provide comfort and nurturing for anyone dealing with loss.
author: Della Temple
